title: Bug 14197 - Removing a working set immediately triggers changes
description: Removing a working set immediately triggers changes in the software.
OB: When a working set is removed, the package view is immediately altered, even though it should remain unchanged until the working set dialog is closed.
EB: The package view should only be updated when the working set dialog is closed, not immediately upon removing a working set.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Create a working set with one project and select it in the package view, ensuring that the package view is filtered accordingly.
2. Open the working set dialog again and create a second working set.
3. Delete the first working set and observe that the package view is immediately updated, which is unexpected.
